Hello,

I can see that both Sandy and Airly have posted on other threads.
Please do not forget to do so in the 'Enter the Jungle' thread and
Airly, you also have Nightlight in the 'Movements in the Dark' thread.

Hydras still needs to command his troops. Leo Prime is preping his
troops to move out, but it is up to you if Hydras commands his men to
do the same. Also will Rat Trap, Straightshot and Quickstride be
following Leo's orders or do they have some mischief to get in?

In the other thread Nightlight now has company in the room seeking to
take her in. Will she comply or fight?

Am I making these threads too difficult? I am more used to table top
GMing, so am stuill adjusting somewhat to the changes. Feel free to
talk to me either who or by private email.

If there is anything you guys want to see, if you have any comments or
anything, please let me know as well. I am trying not to reveal plots
and such, but if there is something else you want to happen, I will
try to accomodate if possible.

I hope to have posts by Wednesday.

Thanks
- Preston
